paragraphs: Located in Lawrence Kaculu, Ngala Beach Lodge features free WiFi, a garden and outdoor pool.
The accommodation has a seating area. Every unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. Towels are available.
Ngala Beach Lodge also includes a year-round outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a barbecue and a restaurant on site. The property also offers packed lunches.
The property has a private beach area and water sports facilities and car hire is available. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including horse riding and snorkelling.

address: Vorberg 338, 8972 Ramsau am Dachstein, Austria, Ramsau am Dachstein

paragraphs: Located in Ramsau am Dachstein and completely renovated in 2014, Ramsau Appartements Pickl offers self-catering accommodation with a mountain-view balcony and free WiFi. The property is 2.5 km from Klanglift and 2.5 km from Bergkristall Lift.
The apartments feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a well-equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes.

At Ramsau Appartements Pickl you will find a communal sauna. Other facilities like ski storage are offered free of charge. Activities in the surrounding area include skiing and golfing. The property offers free parking.
The stop of the free ski bus and a cross-country skiing track can be found right outside.

name: Ramsau Appartements Pickl

Know Before You Go

  • Parking height restrictions apply.

Fees

The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.

  • Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 29 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Mandatory Fees and Taxes

You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:

  • Deposit: EUR 200.0 per stay
  • A tax is imposed by the city and collected at the property. This tax is adjusted seasonally and might not apply year round. Other exemptions or reductions might apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.
  • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.60 per person, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

paragraphs: With a stay at Domoikos Casa e Dimora, you'll be centrally located in Catania, steps from Piazza Stesicoro and within a 5-minute walk of Via Etnea.  This bed & breakfast is 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Catania Cathedral and 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Catania Fish Market.
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).

Make yourself at home in one of the 3 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring free minibar items and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

name: Domoikos Casa E Dimora

A QR code is required for all guests over 18 years of age.
Russian citizens must have an original Russian passport upon arrival.
